title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:prevent_entity_collision'
- Prevents an entity colliding with the entity who has this power, if all conditions are met.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, collision is only affected as long as both the 'actor' (the entity with the power), and the 'target' fulfill the specified conditions.
